## CCWJ Main Lab

The CCWJ main lab is located in the CME Building on level L1, in room L1-108.

```{r leaflet-map}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
library(leaflet)
library(sf)

leaflet() |>
  addProviderTiles(provider = providers$Esri.WorldTopoMap) |>
  addMarkers(lat = 53.52795, lng = -113.53015,
             label = "CME Building Entrance") |>
  fitBounds(-113.52956, 53.52830, -113.52956, 53.52830)
```

:::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="80%"}

## Parking

Parking is available at Windsor Car Park, which is located directly adjacent to the Donadeo Innovation Centre. There is a direct Pedway connection on Parkade Level 5, which connects to Level 2 at Donadeo (by the elevators).

[Google Maps Link](https://goo.gl/maps/8Bw5y9cuMrfUYt1E7)
